Common Name: Sturgeon, white (U.S.A. (ID, MT), Canada (B.C.), Kootenai R. system)
Minnow, Rio Grande Silvery (Entire, except where listed as an experimental population)
Riversnail, Anthony's (Wherever found; Except where listed as Experimental Populations)

Scientific Name: Chorizanthe robusta (incl. vars. robusta and hartwegii)
